column1: Canada is the country that contains more than half of all the natural lakes in the world.
Saudi Arabia is the largest country on the Arabian Peninsula.
The country Chile accounts for more than half of the western coastline of South America.
Sudan is the African nation with the most pyramids.
Africa is the only continent with land in all four hemispheres.
Brazil is the most populated nation in South America.
Russia is the largest country in the world in terms of land area.
